# fptcloud_edge_gateways (Data Source)

Retrieves a list of FPT Cloud edge gateways. If name is provided, returns only edge gateways matching that name.

## Example Usage

### Get all edge gateways in a VPC

```terraform
data "fptcloud_edge_gateways" "all" {
  vpc_id = "your_vpc_id"
}

output "all_edge_gateways" {
  value = data.fptcloud_edge_gateways.all.edge_gateways
}
```

### Filter edge gateways by name

```terraform
data "fptcloud_edge_gateways" "filtered" {
  vpc_id = "your_vpc_id"
  name   = "my-edge-gateway"
}

output "filtered_edge_gateways" {
  value = data.fptcloud_edge_gateways.filtered.edge_gateways
}
```

### Access specific edge gateway properties

```terraform
data "fptcloud_edge_gateways" "example" {
  vpc_id = "your_vpc_id"
}

output "first_edge_gateway_id" {
  value = length(data.fptcloud_edge_gateways.example.edge_gateways) > 0 ? data.fptcloud_edge_gateways.example.edge_gateways[0].id : null
}

output "edge_gateway_names" {
  value = [for eg in data.fptcloud_edge_gateways.example.edge_gateways : eg.name]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `vpc_id` (String) VPC id to filter edge gateways

### Optional

- `name` (String) Name of the edge gateway to filter. If empty, returns all edge gateways.

### Read-Only

- `edge_gateways` (List of Object) List of edge gateways (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--edge_gateways))

<a id="nestedatt--edge_gateways"></a>
### Nested Schema for `edge_gateways`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Identifier of the edge gateway
- `name` (String) Name of the edge gateway
- `edge_gateway_id` (String) Edge gateway id
- `vpc_id` (String) VPC id
